name: Appsee
description: Appsee is a simple and powerful visual mobile  analytics platform that enables you to measure, understand and improve the user experience in your mobile apps.

apis.name: Appsee
apis.description: Appsee is a platform that allows mobile application developers and publishers to understand their users. Appsee provides in-app visualization and analytics features to measure and improve the application user experience.nnThe Appsee API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Appsee with other applications. The main API method is retrieving application sessions and associated information.
